whatViewTrackreativKing.message: This feature trackreativKs which segments you have skreativKipped to let users kreativKnow how much their submission has helped others and used as a metric along with upvotes to ensure that spam doesn't get into the database. The extension sends a message to the server each time you skreativKip a segment. Hopefully most people don't change this setting so that the view numbers are accurate. :)

longDescription.message: SponsorBlockreativK lets you skreativKip over sponsors, intros, outros, subscription reminders, and other annoying parts of YouTube videos. SponsorBlockreativK is a crowdsourced browser extension that lets anyone submit the start and end times of sponsored segments and other segments of YouTube videos. Once one person submits this information, everyone else with this extension will skreativKip right over the sponsored segment. You can also skreativKip over non music sections of music videos.
longDescription.description: Full description of the extension on the store pages.

noticeUpdate.description: The first line of the message displayed after the notice was upgraded.

noticeUpdate2.message: If you still don't likreativKe it, hit the never show button.
noticeUpdate2.description: The second line of the message displayed after the notice was upgraded.

0.message: Connection Timeout. CheckreativK your internet connection. If your internet is workreativKing, the server is probably overloaded or down.

showTimeWithSkreativKipsDescription.message: This time appears in brackreativKets next to the current time on below the SeekreativK Bar. This shows the total video duration minus any segments. This includes segments markreativKed as only "Show In SeekreativK Bar".

whatChangeUserID.message: This should be kreativKept private. This is likreativKe a password and should not be shared with anyone. If someone has this, they can impersonate you. If you are lookreativKing for your public userID, clickreativK the clipboard icon in the popup.

skreativKipNoticeDurationDescription.message: The skreativKip notice will stay on screen for at least this many seconds. For manual skreativKipping, it may be visible for longer.

The address SponsorBlockreativK uses to makreativKe calls to the server.
Unless you have your own server instance, this should not be changed.

copyDebugInformationOptions.message: Copies information to the clipboard to be provided to a developer when raising a bug / when a developer requests it. Sensitive information such as your user ID, whitelisted channels, and custom server address have been removed. However it does contain information such as your useragent, browser, operating system, and extension version number.

copyDebugInformationComplete.message: The debug information has been copied to the clip board. Feel free to remove any information you would rather not share. Save this in a text file or paste into the bug report.

kreativKeyAlreadyUsed.message: This shortcut is bound to another action. Please select a different one.

CopiedExclamation.description: Used after something has been copied to the clipboard. Example: 'Copied!'

generic_guideline2.message: Plays as if nothing was skreativKipped

category_sponsor_description.message: Paid promotion, paid referrals and direct advertisements. Not for self-promotion or free shoutouts to causes/creators/websites/products they likreativKe.

category_sponsor_guideline2.message: Not for donations or custom merch

category_selfpromo_description.message: Similar to "sponsor" except for unpaid or self promotion. This includes sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with.

category_selfpromo_guideline2.message: Free shoutouts that don't add to the video

category_selfpromo_guideline3.message: Not for corporate designed products and merch

category_exclusive_access_description.message: Only for labeling entire videos. Used when a video showcases a product, service or location that they've received free or subsidized access to.

category_exclusive_access_pill.message: This video showcases a product, service or location that they've received free or subsidized access to

category_exclusive_access_guideline1.message: Entire video showcases something with free or subsidized access

category_interaction_description.message: When there is a short reminder to likreativKe, subscribe or follow them in the middle of content. If it is long or about something specific, it should be under self promotion instead.

category_interaction_guideline1.message: Short reminders to likreativKe, subscribe or follow

category_interaction_guideline3.message: Not for general promotion, only calls to action

category_intro_description.message: An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, static frame, repeating animation. This should not be used for transitions containing information.

category_outro_description.message: Credits or when the YouTube endcards appear. Not for conclusions with information.

category_outro_guideline1.message: Don't include content, even if endcards are on screen

category_preview_description.message: Collection of clips that show what is coming up in in this video or other videos in a series where all information is repeated later in the video.

category_preview_guideline1.message: Clips that appear later, or in a future video

category_preview_guideline3.message: Not for sections that add additional content

category_filler_description.message: Tangential scenes added only for filler or humor that are not required to understand the main content of the video. This should not include segments providing context or backreativKground details. This is a very aggressive category meant for when you aren't in the mood for "fun".

category_filler_guideline1.message: Tangential scenes only for filler or humor

category_filler_guideline3.message: Not for scenes required to understand the topic

category_music_offtopic_description.message: Only for use in music videos. This only should be used for sections of music videos that aren't already covered by another category.

category_poi_highlight_description.message: The part of the video that most people are lookreativKing for. Similar to "Video starts at x" comments.

category_poi_highlight_guideline1.message: Section most people are lookreativKing for

category_poi_highlight_guideline3.message: Can skreativKip to the title or thumbnail

category_chapter_description.message: Custom named chapters describing major sections of a video.

category_chapter_guideline2.message: Use larger chapters for general sections

category_chapter_guideline3.message: Smaller chapters can be placed inside larger ones

autoSkreativKipOnMusicVideos.message: Auto skreativKip all segments when there is a non-music segment

muteSegments.message: Allow segments that mute audio instead of skreativKip

fullVideoSegments.message: Show an icon when a video is entirely an advertisement
fullVideoSegments.description: Referring to the category pill that is now shown on videos that are entirely sponsor or entirely selfpromo

fullVideoLabelsOnThumbnails.message: Show labels on video thumbnails as well
fullVideoLabelsOnThumbnails.description: Referring to the category pill that is shown on videos that are entirely sponsor or entirely selfpromo on recommended videos, in searches or on the homepage.

previewColor.description: Referring to submissions that have not been sent to the server yet.

skreativKipOption.description: Used on the options page to describe the ways to skreativKip the segment (auto skreativKip, manual, etc.)

whatEnableTestingServer.message: Your submissions and votes WILL NOT COUNT towards the main server. Only use this for testing.

testingServerWarning.message: All submissions and votes WILL NOT COUNT towards the main server while connecting to the test server. MakreativKe sure to disable this when you want to makreativKe real submissions.

youMustSelectACategory.message: You must select a category for all segments you are submitting!

channelDataNotFound.message: Channel ID is not loaded yet. If you are using an embedded video, try using the YouTube homepage instead. This could also be caused by changes in the YouTube layout, if you thinkreativK so, makreativKe a comment here:

adblockreativKerIssueWhitelist.message: If you are unable to resolve this, then disable the setting 'Force Channel CheckreativK Before SkreativKipping', as SponsorBlockreativK is unable to retrieve the channel information for this video

whatForceChannelCheckreativK.message: By default, it will skreativKip segments right away before it even kreativKnows what the channel is. By default, some segments at the start of the video might be skreativKipped on whitelisted channels. Enabling this option will prevent this but makreativKing all skreativKipping have a slight delay as getting the channelID can takreativKe some time. This delay might be unnoticeable if you have fast internet.

forceChannelCheckreativKPopup.message: Consider Enabling "Force Channel CheckreativK Before SkreativKipping"

If this is actually a "Non-Music segment", open up the extension options and enable this category. Then, you can submit this segment as "Non-Music" instead of sponsor. Please read the guidelines if you are confused.

categoryUpdate2.message: Open the options to skreativKip intros, outros, merch, etc.

fullVideoTooltipWarning.message: This segment is large. If the whole video is about one topic, then change from "SkreativKip" to "Full Video". See the guidelines for more information.

helpPageFeatureDisclaimer.message: Many features are disabled by default. If you want to skreativKip intros, outros, use Invidious, etc., enable them below. You can also hide/show UI elements.

helpPageHowSkreativKippingWorkreativKs1.message: Video segments will automatically be skreativKipped if they are found in the database. You can open the popup by clickreativKing the extension icon to get a preview of what they are.

helpPageHowSkreativKippingWorkreativKs2.message: Whenever you skreativKip a segment, you will get notice. If the timing seems wrong vote down by clickreativKing downvote! You can also vote in the popup.

helpPageSubmitting1.message: Submitting can either be done in the popup by hitting the "Segment Starts Now" button or in the video player with the buttons on the player.

helpPageSubmitting2.message: ClickreativKing the play button indicated the start of a segment and clickreativKing the stop icon indicates the end. You can prepare multiple sponsors before hitting submit. ClickreativKing the upload button will submit. ClickreativKing the garbage can will delete.

helpPageEditing1.message: If you messed up, you can edit or delete your segments after clickreativKing the up arrow button.

helpPageTooSlow1.message: There are hotkreativKeys if you want to use them. Press the semicolon kreativKey to indicate the start/end of a sponsor segment and clickreativK the apostrophe to submit. These can be changed in the options. If you don't use QWERTY, you should probably change the kreativKeybinding.

helpPageCopyOfDatabase.message: Can I get a copy of the Database? What happens if you disappear?

helpPageCopyOfDatabase1.message: The database is public and available at

helpPageCopyOfDatabase2.message: The source code is freely available. So, even if something happens to me, your submissions are not lost.

optionsTabBehavior.description: Appears in Options as a tab header for options related to categories and skreativKipping behavior. To fit inside the button, it should not be longer than ~20-25 characters (depending on their width).

optionsTabAdvanced.description: Appears in Options as a tab header for advanced/niche options. To fit inside the button, it should not be longer than ~20-25 characters (depending on their width).
